quilt.computer

Class AWTDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • quilt.gui.Drawer
      • quilt.computer.AWTDrawer

  • public class AWTDrawer
extends quilt.gui.Drawer
    AWTDrawer

    Simple GUI for drawing quilts.

    Source code is available.
